instructions: Open the Phone app. Tap Favorites at the bottom of the screen. Select + at the top. Choose the contact you want to add to the Favorites list. You can find him or her by searching, scrolling, or tapping a letter off to the side. Decide which type of communication you want to be the favorite: Message , Call , Video , or Mail . If the person has multiple details for one category (such as two phone numbers), tap the arrow to choose a specific one.

Tap Favorites at the bottom of the Phone app. Select Edit at the top. Locate the favorite contact you want to rearrange, and tap-and-hold the three-lined button to the right to get a hold of it. Without letting go, drag the contact up or down the list. Tap Done to exit edit mode.
